item.title: First Autopsy
item.description: autopsy I performed my first autopsy. Link to heading This was in our forensic medicine practicals. We had a senior doctor guiding us, and also a helper. I immediately volunteered to perform the autopsy. Two other guys also volunteered. It was a unique experience. I wasn’t nervous at all. I honestly felt nothing, other than slight anticipation. Also the body wasn’t that bad, it was pretty well preserved. I performed an incision of the torso, I cut open the stomach, and also examined the heart, which was taken out of the body.
